Posts.Content: Apr 11, 2016 10:26PM KaliforniaDawn wrote: Can you go to the ER for meds? I have a history of anxiety too and I suffered from postpartum anxiety/OCD really bad, to the point I was in the ER and given a shot of Ativan. It worked fast and calmed me down quick! You might want to conisder that if you feel like breaking down. I really sympathize with you. I hope you get the treatment you need.

Posts.Content: Apr 12, 2016 11:55AM KaliforniaDawn wrote: I'm sorry Tallygurl1973 They shouldn't have you waiting that long. I had a breast exam, ultrasound and fine needle aspiration all within a 48 hour period when I had a lump in my breast 10 years ago- fortunately it was benign. I have an appointment tomorrow with a different doctor for the new symptoms I've begun to experience. I suggest you take a deep breath and think positive thoughts!!
